trans-unit.source: Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows
trans-unit.target: Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows

trans-unit.source: Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows
trans-unit.target: Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows

trans-unit.source: This section explains how to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: This section explains how to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: It also explains how to enable the optional feature for [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: It also explains how to enable the optional feature for [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] on supported systems, download and install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881).
trans-unit.target: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] on supported systems, download and install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Installing Windows PowerShell](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Installing Windows PowerShell](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md).

trans-unit.source: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] on supported systems, download and install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] on supported systems, download and install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Installing Windows PowerShell](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Installing Windows PowerShell](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md).

trans-unit.source: How to Start [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] on Earlier Versions of Windows
trans-unit.target: How to Start [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] on Earlier Versions of Windows

trans-unit.source: Use any of the following methods to start the installed version of [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], where applicable.
trans-unit.target: Use any of the following methods to start the installed version of [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], where applicable.

trans-unit.source: From the Start Menu
trans-unit.target: From the Start Menu

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **PowerShell**, and then click **Windows PowerShell**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Start**, type **PowerShell**, and then click **Windows PowerShell**.

trans-unit.source: From the **Start** menu, click **Start**, click **All Programs**, click **Accessories**, click the **Windows PowerShell** folder, and then click **Windows PowerShell**.
trans-unit.target: From the **Start** menu, click **Start**, click **All Programs**, click **Accessories**, click the **Windows PowerShell** folder, and then click **Windows PowerShell**.

trans-unit.source: At the Command Prompt
trans-unit.target: At the Command Prompt

trans-unit.source: In Cmd.exe, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], type:
trans-unit.target: In Cmd.exe, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], type:

trans-unit.source: You can also use the parameters of the PowerShell.exe program to customize the session.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the parameters of the PowerShell.exe program to customize the session.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [PowerShell.exe Command-Line Help](../Topic/PowerShell.exe-Command-Line-Help.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [PowerShell.exe Command-Line Help](../Topic/PowerShell.exe-Command-Line-Help.md).

trans-unit.source: With Administrative privileges ("Run as administrator")
trans-unit.target: With Administrative privileges ("Run as administrator")

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **PowerShell**, right\-click **Windows PowerShell**, and then click **Run as administrator**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Start**, type **PowerShell**, right\-click **Windows PowerShell**, and then click **Run as administrator**.

trans-unit.source: How to Start [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] on Earlier Releases of Windows
trans-unit.target: How to Start [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] on Earlier Releases of Windows

trans-unit.source: Use any of the following methods to start [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Use any of the following methods to start [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: From the Start Menu
trans-unit.target: From the Start Menu

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **ISE**, and then click **Windows PowerShell ISE**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Start**, type **ISE**, and then click **Windows PowerShell ISE**.

trans-unit.source: From the **Start** menu, click **Start**, click **All Programs**, click **Accessories**, click the **Windows PowerShell** folder, and then click **Windows PowerShell ISE**.
trans-unit.target: From the **Start** menu, click **Start**, click **All Programs**, click **Accessories**, click the **Windows PowerShell** folder, and then click **Windows PowerShell ISE**.

trans-unit.source: At the Command Prompt
trans-unit.target: At the Command Prompt

trans-unit.source: In Cmd.exe, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], type:
trans-unit.target: In Cmd.exe, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], type:

trans-unit.source: or
trans-unit.target: or

trans-unit.source: With Administrative privileges ("Run as administrator")
trans-unit.target: With Administrative privileges ("Run as administrator")

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **ISE**, right\-click **Windows PowerShell ISE**, and then click **Run as administrator**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Start**, type **ISE**, right\-click **Windows PowerShell ISE**, and then click **Run as administrator**.

trans-unit.source: How to Enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] on Earlier Releases of Windows
trans-unit.target: How to Enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] on Earlier Releases of Windows

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] is enabled by default on all versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] is enabled by default on all versions of Windows.

trans-unit.source: If it is not already enabled, Windows Management Framework 4.0 or [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] enables it.
trans-unit.target: If it is not already enabled, Windows Management Framework 4.0 or [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] enables it.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] is enabled by default on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] is enabled by default on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: However, on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], it is an optional feature.
trans-unit.target: However, on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], it is an optional feature.

trans-unit.source: To enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], use the following procedure.
trans-unit.target: To enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], use the following procedure.

trans-unit.source: To enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: To enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Start Server Manager.
trans-unit.target: Start Server Manager.

trans-unit.source: Click **Features** and then click **Add Features**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Features** and then click **Add Features**.

trans-unit.source: In Select Features, click [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: In Select Features, click [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)].
